mapper.select: select userId, takeYear, takeSemester, subjectCode, subjectName, credit, score, completionDivision from mySubject where userId like #{userId}
select count(*) from mySubject where userId = #{userId}

select userId, takeYear, takeSemester, subjectCode, subjectName, credit, score, completionDivision from mySubject where userId like #{userId} and takeYear like #{takeYear} and takeSemester like #{takeSemester}
select * from mySubject where userId like #{userId} and takeSemester like #{takeYear} and takeYear like #{takeSemester}
select userId, takeYear, takeSemester, subjectCode, subjectName, credit, score, completionDivision from mySubject where userId like #{userId} and completionDivision like #{completionDivision};
mapper.insert:
INSERT into mySubject(takeYear, takeSemester, subjectCode, subjectName, completionDivision, credit, score, userId) VALUES
('${mySubject.takeYear}', '${mySubject.takeSemester}', '${mySubject.subjectCode}', '${mySubject.subjectName}', '${mySubject.completionDivision}', '${mySubject.credit}', '${mySubject.score}', '${mySubject.userId}')
mapper.delete: delete from mySubject where userId like #{userId} and subjectCode like #{subjectCode};
mapper.select: select DISTINCT mySubject.subjectName from mySubject right outer join requiredSubject on mySubject.subjectCode=requiredSubject.subjectCode where mySubject.userId like #{userId};

select DISTINCT requiredSubject.subjectCode, subject.subjectName from requiredSubject left join subject on requiredSubject.subjectCode = subject.code where requiredSubject.admissionYear like #{admissionYear} and requiredSubject.departmentId like #{departmentId} and subject.year like #{admissionYear} and subject.departmentId like #{departmentId};
select DISTINCT m.subjectCode, s.subjectName from mySubject m left join subject s on m.subjectCode = s.code where m.userId like #{userId} and s.year like '2016';
select * from mySubject where userId=#{userId} and (completionDivision='전필' or completionDivision='전선');
select count(*) from mySubject where userId=#{userId} and completionDivision='전필';
select * from mySubject where userId=#{userId} and (completionDivision='교필' or completionDivision='교선');
select count(*) from mySubject where userId=#{userId}and (subjectCode='AC00003' or subjectCode='AE00046' or subjectCode='AE00029' or subjectCode='AE00030' )and score='P'
select distinct s.code,m.* from mySubject m left join subject s on m.subjectCode = s.code where s.departmentId=#{departmentId} and m.userId=#{userId}

select r.subjectCode, s.subjectName name from requiredSubject r left join subject s on r.subjectCode=s.code where r.subjectCode like #{subjectCode} and r.admissionYear like left(#{userId}, 4) and s.year like left(#{userId}, 4) and s.divisionClass like '01';
